questions.quote: Look, who are you kidding? You come up to my apartment with your table and your little oils, and I'm not supposed to expect anything? You're a massage teaser.
And what about yooou?!? Â Tryin' to bilk an innocent bystander out of a family fortune, built on sweat and toil, manufacturing quality O'Henry candy bars, for honest, hard-working Americans!
Look, Jerry, I'm sorry, I'm uh- you have insurance, right buddy?
Because they're the best Jerry, the best. Look. Maybe I'm just being paranoid.
Yeah, see, I think people want to look like pirates. You know, it's the right time for it.. to be all puffy, and devil-may-care..
Okay, now I know. Should I keep going or turn around, do you have a preference?
What about Thursday night? I mean they're playing the Sonics.
Mr. Peterman, you have my deepest sympathies. Unfortunately, I've gotta get going.
Ugh. You wouldn't believe it. My boyfriend dumped me. My friends, who I don't even like, they won't talk to me.  All because I don't like that stupid English Patient movie.
Hello Jerry. Well, I may have a solution to our little problem. Elaine, would you excuse us?
